data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 13,393 believers in Gir Somnath, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gir Somnath, Gujarat, India

data.prayer: Please, convict the 13,393 believers in Gir Somnath, Gujarat, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.section_summary: On average, 98 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Gir Somnath, Gujarat, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,217,500 people living in Gir Somnath, Gujarat, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Gir Somnath, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Shenva (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Gir Somnath, Gujarat, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Gir Somnath, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Gir Somnath, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Gir Somnath
location.people_groups_list: Vaghri (Muslim traditions), Behlim, Vasava, Nadia, Shenva (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vaghri (Muslim traditions) (22,000), Behlim (8,200), Vasava (600), Nadia (54,000), Shenva (Hindu traditions) (118,000)
